Like-Like moved inside and stared at Magmatron, just staring, tilting aroun=
d and staring.

Like-Like: Hmmm...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: =
dachande 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001=
 10:13 PM
  Subject: Re: Destron's have a visitor...


  ::Magmatron::
   
=
      He liked what he heard. He dropped the sheilds. "Please, come into my=
 humble abode. I hope we can become good friends."
    ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
    From: Soulstice Omega 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Se=
nt: Thursday, February 01, 2001 5:32 PM
    Subject: Re: Destron's have a v=
isitor...


    Like-Like, in his beast mode, was partly imune to these sho=
ts, and it would take a number of them to sink through his flabby organics,=
 which were very powerful. He hears Magamtron's voice and stops his crashin=
g. He wiggles around slowly, his mechanics slightly locked up, but his orga=
nics working fine. He liked Magmatron's voice, it sounded nice to him. He w=
asn't really very intelligent, but he waited for Magmatron to say something=
 else, in the mean time only saying one word:

    Like-Like: Master?...
  =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: dachande 
      To: nbwrpg@ya=
hoogroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 4:54 PM
      Subjec=
t: Re: Destron's have a visitor...


      Sheilds are up.
       
      ::=
Magmatron::
       
          The external defense system came online, and =
shot at the transformer. It was only a stun. Then Magmatron sent a comm to =
the bot, it was his policy, you get a warning shot, then a comm, and if you=
 fail to answer or show hostilities then you die.
          "What do you th=
ink your doing?!" Magmatron boomed. "Cease and desist, or be destroyed."
  =
      ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Soulstice Omega 
        =
To: NBW 
        Sent: Wednesday, January 31, 2001 11:37 PM
        Subject=
: Destron's have a visitor...


        Like-Like had been traveling in no =
direction is particular for a long time, and had wandered across land and s=
ea until he made it to Northern Maine. He moved right up to the Destron bas=
e. He stopped, he knew there was something obstructing his path, and he did=
n't want to go around it. Like-Like rammed into the base, and:

        1: =
(If the shields are down) He rammed into it again and again, howling.

    =
    2: (If the shields are up) He slammed into it, was shocked and burnt by=
 the shields, and then repeated this again and again, creating a black mark=
 on his flabby slimy skin...





          Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
        =
     
                      www.
